mapper.insert: insert into share_dev (id, type_id, name, status, sn, lng, lat, addr, platform_code, del_flag, create_by, create_at, update_by, update_at) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{typeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{sn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lng,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{platformCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

update share_dev
type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=BIGINT},

update share_dev set type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, sn = #{sn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lng = #{lng,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lat = #{lat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, addr = #{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, platform_code = #{platformCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_at = #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_at = #{updateAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from share_dev sd where del_flag = 0
and EXISTS (select 1 from (SELECT regexp_split_to_table(#{typeIds},',') AS type_id) AS vir where cast (vir.type_id as BIGINT) = sd.type_id)
